about_the_game:
Slay the Queens in the Shadows.

Dive into Queen Slayer, an intense turn-based RPG set in a dark fantasy world.

In a realm ruled by eight monstrous queens, lead your mercenary squad on a journey to destroy them.

Assemble your team with mercenaries possessing random traits and unique growth paths, and claim victory through strategy and decisive action.

Build Your Ultimate Mercenary Squad

  • Random Traits:
    Each mercenary is equipped with random traits that grant combat advantages.
    Maximize their potential and strategically form your team for battle.

  • Three Growth Paths:
    Decide your mercenaries' growth direction—Tank, Dealer, or Support—and tailor your team to match your combat style.
    Every decision shifts the tide of battle in your favor.

The Fine Line Between Risk and Reward – Your Choices Define the Battlefield

Will you take on perilous combat in contaminated zones for greater rewards?
Or will you tread cautiously along safer routes, prioritizing survival?
A single choice changes everything.

Two Game Modes – Choose Your Challenge

  • Normal Mode:
    Progress steadily, level up your mercenaries, and experiment with strategies in this accessible mode.

  • Hardcore Mode:
    Face the ultimate test of skill and focus. With no save points and only four mercenaries, your mission is to defeat the queens and survive against all odds.

Into the Depths of Dark Fantasy

  • The Essence of Turn-Based Combat:
    Simple yet profoundly strategic, every turn demands careful planning and decisive choices.

  • Immersive Visuals:
    Experience a dark world brought to life with striking art and twisted monsters.

  • Endless Challenges:
    With random traits and growth systems, every playthrough offers new team combinations and strategies to explore.

Queen Slayer delivers a compact yet deeply challenging experience.
Discover the allure of turn-based combat and dark fantasy as you craft your unique strategies.
